Title: Requires a report on the utilization and activity of the statewide fiscal intermediary
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to produce a report on the utilization and activity of the statewide fiscal intermediary with regard to metrics for certain medical assistance programs for needy persons; requires such report to be published no later than sixty days after effectiveness.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring a report on the utilization and activity of the statewide fiscal intermediary; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
